wikipedia_page.main: June Knox-Mawer, née Ellis (10 May 1930 in Wrexham, Wales – 19 April 2006) was a British writer of non-fiction books and romance novels and a radio broadcaster. In 1992, her novel Sandstorm won the Romantic Novel of the Year Award by the Romantic Novelists' Association.

response: *June Knox-Mawer, 75, British writer and radio broadcaster.June Knox-Mawer
